analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x70a128fe6c4f654f52fc799f250506bed550945e.sol:
	Contract CpublicGold has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x70a128fe6c4f654f52fc799f250506bed550945e.sol#171)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0x70a128fe6c4f654f52fc799f250506bed550945e.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
